title: Hands-on with the new Acer Swift 3 laptop for 2022
content:
Acer introduced a refreshed model of the Swift 3 for 2022 ahead of this year’s MWC, and it comes with a few improvements. It has new processors, a tweaked design, and a new display option. While we don’t expect the laptop to be available to buy before June, Acer was kind enough to send us

The post Hands-on with the new Acer Swift 3 laptop for 2022 appeared first on XDA.
description: Acer's refreshed Swift 3 laptop for 2022 comes with a better webcam and small design tweaks. and we went hands-on with it.
